comment: Smart Data Models - ExcAVR7 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcAVR7/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. IVO excitation system.

contents.name: a1
contents.comment: Lead coefficient (A1).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: a2
contents.comment: Lag coefficient (A2).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: a3
contents.comment: Lead coefficient (A3).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: a4
contents.comment: Lag coefficient (A4).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: a5
contents.comment: Lead coefficient (A5).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: a6
contents.comment: Lag coefficient (A6).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: k1
contents.comment: Gain (K1).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k3
contents.comment: Gain (K3).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: k5
contents.comment: Gain (K5).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: t1
contents.comment: Lead time constant (T1).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0

contents.name: t2
contents.comment: Lag time constant (T2).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: t3
contents.comment: Lead time constant (T3).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: t4
contents.comment: Lag time constant (T4).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: t5
contents.comment: Lead time constant (T5).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: t6
contents.comment: Lag time constant (T6).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0

contents.name: vmax1
contents.comment: Lead-lag max. limit (Vmax1).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vmax3
contents.comment: Lead-lag max. limit (Vmax3).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vmax5
contents.comment: Lead-lag max. limit (Vmax5).  Typical Value = 5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vmin1
contents.comment: Lead-lag min. limit (Vmin1).  Typical Value = -5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vmin3
contents.comment: Lead-lag min. limit (Vmin3).  Typical Value = -5. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vmin5
contents.comment: Lead-lag min. limit (Vmin5).  Typical Value = -2. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
